poster: S E X Y B O I
title: WHY ISN'T NIDALEE DISABLED?
body:
Riot is aware this bug exists, but they don't do anything about it. They claim to have fixed it every few patches, but they didn't do shit.
IF YOU HAVE A NUKE SKILLSHOT THAT 2 SHOTS YOUR ADC AT LVL 18, THEN YOU SHOULD BE ABLE TO SEE THE DAMN SPEAR FFS.

Also, nerf Nidalee.

replies.body: YOU ARE ABLE TO SEE HTE DAMN SPEAR!!!! I MAIN NIDALEE, AND HAVE PUT SO MUCH TIME INTO HER. THE PARTICLES ON HER SPEAR HAVE NOT CHANGED IN SO LONG!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Acidic Puddle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wyypcBZw,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-10T19:58:07.367+0000)
>
> YOU ARE ABLE TO SEE HTE DAMN SPEAR!!!! I MAIN NIDALEE, AND HAVE PUT SO MUCH TIME INTO HER. THE PARTICLES ON HER SPEAR HAVE NOT CHANGED IN SO LONG!!!!!

The person playing her can see the spear. No one else can.
pretty much this.

> [{quoted}](name=Acidic Puddle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wyypcBZw,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-10T19:58:07.367+0000)
>
> YOU ARE ABLE TO SEE HTE DAMN SPEAR!!!! I MAIN NIDALEE, AND HAVE PUT SO MUCH TIME INTO HER. THE PARTICLES ON HER SPEAR HAVE NOT CHANGED IN SO LONG!!!!!

The spear is invisible; you cannot see it at all. It's not just that you can't see the particles, the whole model is missing.
Edit: it doesn't happen every game, though it occurs pretty often
While they're at it they should also change Headhunter's spears so that they're not next to invisible
You can see them sometimes, it's just that the spear is WAY thinner than the actual hitbox

> [{quoted}](name=Hurny Quilva,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wyypcBZw,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2015-03-10T21:01:38.621+0000)
>
> You can see them sometimes, it's just that the spear is WAY thinner than the actual hitbox

"way thinner than the hitbox"

Guess you never played when nidalee was throwing trees

Worse than Thresh's hook.

{{champion:13}} "Oh, better side step..."

Schunk!

{{champion:13}} "Wait what?"

Schunk!

"An ally has been slain!"
It's a fact that Thresh's hooks have a larger hitbox at max range. I have no fucking clue why.

No, its a bug where the spear does not appear for the opposing team. Its been around for a few years actually. Happens most often when thrown from the fog of war, but happens occasionally in lane, hell even in ARAMs.

replies.poster: S E X Y B O I

replies.body: I agree with OP, the spears need to be invisible 100% of the time - not just sometimes. Rito fix this bug pls
Sometimes you can't even see the visual effects. It sucks when you are clearing a wave, acknowledging Nid might be nearby, ready to dodge, and you die randomly
they are turning it invisible to increase counterplay

ITT: people trying to defend nidalee when the thread is about fixing a game breaking bug.

She's overpowered, but this is a separate issue.  Nidalee isn't the only champ with invisible skillshot bugs.  I've seen (or not seen it) with morg snare too.  Getting locked for 3s because of an invisible morg snare as kogmaw is a good way to guarantee your death.
or Invis Anivia Q!
that one's super duper rare. also, it's invisible for everyone when it happens, and is visible for a portion of its distance before turning invisible.

You can throw an invisible Ez Q if you animation cancel correctly, I seem to recall. That's not really something that can be done at will, though, or happens enough to be worth noting, but last time I tried it worked.
All is see half the time is the particles coming from it.  Nobody is complaining about Mundo his hatchets are completely invisible.
And flying at supersonic speed, ffs...

{{champion:36}} "Mundo CEO!"
{{champion:36}} "Mundo decide point and click fun!"
{{champion:36}} "Mundo cleavers no need particle anymore!"
{{champion:36}} "Mundo think point and click only fun for Mundo."
{{champion:36}} "Mundo nerf Taric!"

{{item:3070}} {{champion:44}} {{item:3070}}
No matter how many times you nerf Taric... He will still be outrageous

I don't know about them flying faster than normal, only played against a Mundo once since I read about him being glitched, and then only had a few hatchets thrown directly at me, just enough to realise that they are completely invisible and to get me killed a couple times.

It's pretty difficult to see when he's going to throw them, and then it's hard to get out of the way because they fly pretty damned fast... Now Mundo is perfectly fair, I mean, he's a tank with one long ranged method of poke. So his knifes are fine where they're at.
I encountered it pretty recently. My team's mid-laner suddenly dropped dead from around half-health when he was helping out in bottom. Made him rage pretty hard.

Nidalee can easily be countered if you just stay behind minions while farming and moving away when she tries to position herself for a spear. Always call her MIA's as she will easily pick up kills from other lanes if you starve her this way and don't call them.

replies.poster: S E X Y B O I
replies.body: Well I would dodge a lot more spears if I knew that there is a spear flying at me.
No, it's an actual in game bug that I've even experienced. Nidalee throws an invisible spear, you can't see it. I believe the model goes missing.
Well, if you have a ward, you can see her wind-up animation. Watch Nidalee's arm the whole game - counterplay.

Looks like someone has ALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL the answers huh

Well considering I don't usually buy a sight stone as a top laner or mid laner (although I wish I could) and also eventually run out of wards even with upgraded totem. That doesn't really help. It doesn't really affect me late game as much, so I'm talking about those BS early invis ganks. Where all of the sudden I'm marked as hunted.
I'm joking.

Ok guys... no need to dislike... jesus. If you can't see the spears. That is YOUR problem. No need to hate. You can't see the spear but you see the effects, unless you have bad eyesight or you are playing at night with no light which you shouldn't do. And dam, I even saw these hard to see Morgana q's and you are complaining about Nidalee spears? Way easier to dodge. A thing called sidestep, or juking. If you suck doing such things, get banshee.

> [{quoted}](name=EvoFluffyPanda,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wyypcBZw,comment-id=0007000000000004,timestamp=2015-06-22T01:56:47.627+0000)
>
> Ok guys... no need to dislike... jesus. If you can't see the spears. That is YOUR problem. No need to hate. You can't see the spear but you see the effects, unless you have bad eyesight or you are playing at night with no light which you shouldn't do. And dam, I even saw these hard to see Morgana q's and you are complaining about Nidalee spears? Way easier to dodge. A thing called sidestep, or juking. If you suck doing such things, get banshee.

no its a legit bug where the spears are invisible to everyone but the nidalee player i tested it out in a custom game with a friend and 13/50 were invisible so its not too big of a deal but its way too common to not be fixed asap
I see the spear 100% clear. Why yell at invis spears when there is a  teemo with shrooms that make half your health dissapear? Hello? People???
I think that its an uncommon bug since I have never seen this bug or had a champ magically disapear by nidalee, it might be similar to having a blue box where singed's poison goes.

It's a bug about when Nidalee is in the fog of war, so you can't see her. If she throws a spear, the game doesn't pick up on the fact that Nidalee and her spear are two different objects, so, since you can't see Nidalee, you can't see her spear. It's been reported many times, and Riot has said they fixed it many times, but somehow it keep coming up.
Uncommon, perhaps. 100% exists?  Yes. I've been hit and seen people hit by invisible nid spears since before her rework.
I prefer it like this. Instead of getting stressed about dodging every spear, I just laugh my ass off when I insta-die at 1000 health. Playing against Nidalee is a lot more fun this way.
Interesting. I haven't encountered this yet, but it understandably sucks.
Nah, too busy getting ready for ESPORTS LCS #HASHTAGVOTEWHOYOUTHINKISGONNAABUSEOURSHITTYBALANCEDGAMEMORE

Only thing is, if this happened in a pro game one team would say "Game breaking Nidalee bug! Disable her and give us a redo match!" and then Riot would be like "During one of yesterday's LCS matches, we encountered a strange new Nidalee bug that makes her spears invisible. For that reason we are disabling her until we can fix her. In the meantime so that the pros don't get bored we are giving Lee sin some much needed love by buffing his energy costs and and damage ratios."

Dat Rito logic.
Come to think of it, I haven't seen any spears. I think this is fake-- GAH MY EYE WHAT HIT ME

Either A.) They make the spears EASILY visible, since they are already slow traveling and have a super thin hitbox. 

or B.) Reduce the spears damage values.

If I can see the spears, it's my fault I got hit.
If I can't see the spears, at least make it so that it doesn't do 1k damage

Guys, OP's talking about how you can't see her spears atm, as there is this visual bug where you can't see her spears when thrown. It's not even that qq'ing about how strong she is.
Well, she *is* strong, I mean.

Remember when Vel'Koz would turn people's screens blue during Legend of the Poro King? He got disabled for the entirety of that event, and thoroughly humiliated at the same time. And LotPK was a featured, temporary game mode. So why is Nidalee not being disabled when the bug affects normal and ranked games?

there's also been a bug recently where her spears just flat out go through everything.  sometimes it just goes through a couple minions and hits you, sometimes it goes through everything all the time.

NIDALEE IS PURF... 
PLEAZE DONT NERF

I'm a Nidalee main as well, but I can confirm it happens sometimes even when playing her. I thought it was lag at first but obviously it's not if it's happening to others. Like previously said, it doesn't happen every game.
